page.title: 18Games Children Play 1
page.content:
One of the games that we play is called 'Sly Foxie'. It is also called 'Hot Chocolate', 'Hot Frogs' and 'Wolf'. More than two people are needed to play this game. One of the people is "it" and they stand facing a wall. This person has to say "1, 2, 3 Sly Foxie" and then turn around while all the others try to walk to the wall without being seen. If anyone is seen moving by the person turning round then they have to stand with one hand touching the wall until they are released by someone else touching their shoulder. If everyone gets caught the person who was "it" tells a story and at the end of the story she chases the other children and the first one she catches is "it" for the next game.
Hayley Willmott, aged 11.
